businessDiscovery.title: Business Discovery
businessDiscovery.description: Easily find and add businesses for in-depth analysis using URLs or business details.

insightfulDashboards.title: Insightful Dashboards
insightfulDashboards.description: Visualize analysis with scores, sentiments, and competitor data in a clear, actionable dashboard.

aiRecommendations.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
aiRecommendations.description: Receive AI-driven suggestions for digital services tailored to business needs and market gaps.

competitiveAnalysis.title: Competitive Analysis
competitiveAnalysis.description: Automatically identify and compare against direct competitors to understand market positioning.

geographicTargeting.title: Geographic Targeting
geographicTargeting.description: Utilize interactive maps to search businesses by category within specific geographic zones.

actionableReports.title: Actionable Reports
actionableReports.description: Generate comprehensive reports including diagnostics, recommendations, and competitive insights.

AuthLayout.title: Local Digital Eye
AuthLayout.footer: © {year} Local Digital Eye. Your partner in digital growth.

AuthPage.loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your Local Digital Eye dashboard.
AuthPage.signupSubtitle: Get started with your AI-powered local business analysis.

passwordReset.title: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
passwordReset.successDescription: Check your email for the password reset link. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

BusinessesPage.title: Analyzed Businesses
BusinessesPage.description: Manage and review your analyzed businesses.

ProspectingPage.title: Add New Prospects
ProspectingPage.subtitle: Search for businesses on Google to add to your prospecting list.
ProspectingPage.findDescription: Enter a search query like 'Plumbers in London' or 'Garages in Manchester'.
ProspectingPage.prospectsFoundDescription: These are the results from your searches. Filter and connect them to add to the pipeline.
ProspectingPage.notFound: No businesses found for that query. Check for typos or try a more specific search.
ProspectingPage.searchError: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.
ProspectingPage.connectSuccessDescription: The business has been added to your pipeline.
ProspectingPage.connectErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
ProspectingPage.newProspectsToast: new prospects added to the list.
ProspectingPage.noNewProspectsToast: No new prospects found. They might already be in your list.
ProspectingPage.noFilterResults: No results match your current filters.
ProspectingPage.noFilterResultsHint: Try adjusting the filters or performing a new search.
